scripts.clean: bun run clean:src && bun run clean:dist
scripts.build: bun run clean:src && bun run --filter @schmock/core build && bun run --filter @schmock/schema build && bun run --filter @schmock/express build
scripts.test: bun run test:unit && bun run test:bdd
scripts.test:all: bun run typecheck && bun run test:unit && bun run test:bdd
scripts.test:all:quiet: bun run typecheck:quiet && bun run test:unit:quiet && bun run test:bdd:quiet
scripts.test:unit:quiet: bun run --filter '*' test --reporter=dot 2>&1 | grep -E '^[·.F]+$|Test Files.*passed|Tests.*passed|Duration|Exited with code' || true
scripts.test:bdd:quiet: bun run --filter '*' test:bdd --reporter=dot 2>&1 | grep -E '^[·.F]+$|Test Files.*passed|Tests.*passed|Duration|Exited with code' || true
scripts.typecheck:quiet: bun run --filter @schmock/core build:types > /dev/null && bun run --filter @schmock/schema build:types > /dev/null && bun run --filter @schmock/express build:types > /dev/null && bun run --filter @schmock/angular build:types > /dev/null
scripts.typecheck: bun run --filter @schmock/core build:types && bun run --filter @schmock/schema build:types && bun run --filter @schmock/express build:types && bun run --filter @schmock/angular build:types
